name: Marie ROEDER, Individually and as Executrix and Trustee for the Estate of Donald A. Roeder, Respondent v. Carl J. ROEDER, Petitioner

parties: Marie ROEDER, Individually and as Executrix and Trustee for the Estate of Donald A. Roeder, Respondent v. Carl J. ROEDER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of November, 2008, the “Emergent [sic] Motion for Stay Pending Appeal” is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
961 A.2d 55
Marie ROEDER, Individually and as Executrix and Trustee for the Estate of Donald A. Roeder, Respondent v. Carl J. ROEDER, Petitioner.
No. 156 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 24, 2008.
